description: This file defines a Flutter screen, specifically the Orders Overview screen for a manager in a food delivery or ordering app. It contains UI components such as headers, summary chips for order statuses, and placeholder notes, structured within a stateless widget. It references various application-specific classes and themes.

classes.name: ManagerOrdersOverviewScreen
classes.description: Main widget representing the orders overview page for managers, with access control based on user role.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: A decorative header widget with a title, icon, and background gradient.

classes.name: _SummaryChips
classes.description: Displays a set of chips summarizing the number of orders in various statuses.

classes.name: _Note
classes.description: A styled container widget used for displaying informational notes or placeholders.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the entire UI of the Orders Overview screen, including access verification, headers, summaries, and placeholders.

methods.name: chip
methods.description: Helper method to create a styled chip widget with label, color, value, and icon.
